slides.title: Virtual Machines
slides.description: Provides on-demand, scalable Windows and Linux virtual machines. It supports full control over OS, networking, and storage. Commonly used for lift-and-shift workloads.

slides.title: App Service
slides.description: Fully managed platform for building and hosting web apps and APIs. It supports .NET, Java, Node.js, Python, and PHP. Built-in scaling and security simplify deployment.

slides.title: Azure Functions
slides.description: Serverless compute service that runs code in response to events. It scales automatically and charges only for execution time. Ideal for event-driven and microservice architectures.

slides.title: Container Apps
slides.description: Serverless container hosting for microservices and APIs. It abstracts Kubernetes complexity while supporting Dapr and scaling. Suitable for cloud-native workloads.

slides.title: Kubernetes Service
slides.description: Managed Kubernetes service for deploying containerized applications. It simplifies cluster management and scaling. Commonly used for enterprise-grade container orchestration.

slides.title: Virtual Network
slides.description: Provides private network isolation in Azure. It enables secure communication between resources. Supports hybrid connectivity with on-premises networks.

slides.title: Load Balancer
slides.description: Distributes incoming network traffic across resources. It improves availability and reliability. Works at Layer 4 for high-performance scenarios.

slides.title: Application Gateway
slides.description: Web traffic load balancer with application-level routing. It includes Web Application Firewall capabilities. Used to protect and optimize HTTP workloads.

slides.title: Azure DNS
slides.description: Hosts and manages DNS domains using Azure infrastructure. It provides high availability and performance. Integrates seamlessly with other Azure services.

slides.title: Blob Storage
slides.description: Object storage for unstructured data such as images and videos. It is highly scalable and cost-effective. Commonly used for backups and content delivery.

slides.title: File Storage
slides.description: Fully managed file shares in the cloud. It supports SMB and NFS protocols. Useful for lift-and-shift file server scenarios.

slides.title: Queue Storage
slides.description: Message storage for reliable asynchronous communication. It helps decouple application components. Suitable for background processing tasks.

slides.title: Table Storage
slides.description: NoSQL key-value storage for structured data. It offers fast access and scalability. Used for lightweight data storage needs.

slides.title: SQL Database
slides.description: Fully managed relational database based on SQL Server. It offers high availability and automated backups. Ideal for cloud-native applications.

slides.title: SQL Managed Instance
slides.description: Managed SQL Server instance with near-full compatibility. It supports migration from on-prem SQL Server. Used for enterprise workloads.

slides.title: Cosmos DB
slides.description: Globally distributed, multi-model NoSQL database. It offers low latency and elastic scalability. Supports APIs like SQL, MongoDB, and Cassandra.

slides.title: MySQL Database
slides.description: Managed MySQL database service with built-in scaling. It provides automated backups and security. Suitable for open-source workloads.

slides.title: PostgreSQL Database
slides.description: Fully managed PostgreSQL database service. It supports high availability and extensions. Often used for advanced data workloads.

slides.title: Service Bus
slides.description: Enterprise messaging service for reliable communication. It supports queues and topics with transactions. Used for decoupled system architectures.

slides.title: Event Grid
slides.description: Event routing service for reactive architectures. It enables near real-time event delivery. Commonly used with serverless applications.

slides.title: Event Hubs
slides.description: Big data streaming platform and event ingestion service. It can handle millions of events per second. Used for telemetry and analytics pipelines.

slides.title: Logic Apps
slides.description: Low-code workflow automation service. It integrates with hundreds of connectors. Used for business process automation.

slides.title: API Management
slides.description: Manages, secures, and publishes APIs. It provides throttling, monitoring, and authentication. Used as an API gateway solution.

slides.title: Azure DevOps
slides.description: Set of tools for CI/CD, repositories, and project management. It supports Git and automated pipelines. Widely used for DevOps workflows.

slides.title: Monitor
slides.description: Centralized monitoring and diagnostics service. It collects metrics, logs, and alerts. Helps maintain application reliability.

slides.title: Application Insights
slides.description: Application performance monitoring service. It provides telemetry and dependency tracking. Used to detect and diagnose issues quickly.

slides.title: Log Analytics
slides.description: Query-based analytics for logs and metrics. It uses Kusto Query Language. Commonly paired with Azure Monitor.

slides.title: Active Directory
slides.description: Cloud-based identity and access management service. It supports authentication and authorization. Used to secure Azure and SaaS applications.

slides.title: Key Vault
slides.description: Secure storage for secrets, keys, and certificates. It integrates with Azure services and applications. Helps meet security and compliance requirements.

slides.title: Defender Cloud
slides.description: Security posture management and threat protection service. It provides vulnerability assessments and alerts. Used to improve cloud security.

slides.title: Policy
slides.description: Governance service to enforce organizational standards. It ensures compliance across resources. Used for cost and security control.

slides.title: Data Factory
slides.description: Data integration and ETL service. It orchestrates data movement and transformation. Commonly used in analytics pipelines.

slides.title: Synapse Analytics
slides.description: Analytics service combining data warehousing and big data. It supports SQL and Spark workloads. Used for large-scale analytics.

slides.title: Data Lake
slides.description: Optimized storage for big data analytics. It supports hierarchical namespaces. Used with analytics and AI workloads.

slides.title: Machine Learning
slides.description: End-to-end service for building and deploying ML models. It supports Python and popular ML frameworks. Used for predictive analytics.

slides.title: Cognitive Services
slides.description: Prebuilt AI APIs for vision, speech, and language. It enables AI without deep ML expertise. Used to add intelligence to applications.

slides.title: OpenAI Service
slides.description: Managed access to OpenAI models on Azure. It supports generative AI and embeddings. Used for chatbots and AI-driven applications.
